title: BEAUTIFUL SPACIOUS 2 BEDROOM 1 BATHROOM!!!!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Welcome to our Sherwood Apartments in Bellflower, CA for rent.', 'Feel right at home in one of our spacious two or three-bedroom floor plans.', 'Each apartment features amenities including sound-tec urban flooring, Frigidaire energy efficient appliances, huge walk-in closets with plenty of storage space and either a private patio or balcony.', 'Enjoy a relaxed lifestyle with our two sparkling pools and spa, Mickey Mouse wading pool, recreation room, weight room, and huge play structure centered around a giant green dinosaur.', 'Our pet-friendly apartments in Bellflower, CA are perfect for families!', 'Our apartments are conveniently located near the 605 and 91 freeways and across from primary, intermediate, and secondary schools.', "You'll love everything our beautiful community has to offer!", 'Call today and schedule a tour of Sherwood Apartments in Bellflower, CA!', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 14, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'We love your cats and dogs (50 lbs.', 'and under)!', 'All cats must be indoor only.', 'Please provide proof of up to date vaccinations for all pets.', 'Pet Premium is $75 per pet per month.', 'There is an additional deposit of $250 per pet at move in.•$250 Deposit•$75 Monthly Pet Rent•50 lb', 'Weight Limit•2', 'Pet Limit', 'Deposit:',
